Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Note: The claim_events table has a timestamp column for each event. We need to get the first occurrence of each activity for the claim. We can use MIN() with CASE statements to get the first timestamp for each activity. Example for (R, P):   SELECT     claim_id,     MIN(CASE WHEN activity = R THEN timestamp END) AS R_timestamp,     MIN(CASE WHEN activity = P THEN timestamp END) AS P_timestamp  FROM claim_events  GROUP BY claim_id  HAVING MIN(CASE WHEN activity = R THEN timestamp END) IS NOT NULL     AND MIN(CASE WHEN activity = P THEN timestamp END) IS NOT NULL
